name: zwift-workout-route-matcher
description: Intelligent matching of Zwift routes with Xert workouts

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.build-exe: npm run build && pkg standalone-launcher.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output ZwiftWorkoutMatcher.exe --public
scripts.package: npm run build && pkg standalone-launcher.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output ZwiftWorkoutMatcher.exe --public --compress GZip
